mapper.select: SELECT DATE(start_time) AS date, ROUND(AVG( CASE WHEN end_time IS NOT NULL THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, start_time, end_time) ELSE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, start_time, NOW()) END ), 2) AS avgDuration, COUNT(*) AS sessionCount FROM sessions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND start_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) GROUP BY DATE(start_time) ORDER BY date ASC
